A coverage store contains raster format spatial data
This function creates a GeoServer coverage store in a GeoServer instance. 

### Example
  
```coffee
library(rGeoServer)


workspace.name <- "GeoServer.workspace"
access.point <- "http://localhost:8080/geoserver/rest"
coverage.store.name <- "CoverageStoreName"

CreateGeoServerCoverageStore(access.point,
		                     workspace.name,
        			         coverage.store.name,
                             TRUE,
                             "GeoTIFF",
                             "file:data/raster.tif")

```
